extendedInfo.description: Awesome ice breaking physical game in android market. If you like the classic brick breaking game, you will like this.Another amazing game from Ezjoy, the maker of Bird Blast and Marble Blast.===========================================How to play:1. Touch the screen to control the paddle to prevent the ball from hitting the bottom. Break all the ice sculpture to level up.2. The various power ups can make the game much more interesting and challenging.If you like this game, please rate it and recommend to your friends.Thanks for playing!==========================Ezjoy is the name behind Marble Blast, Jewels Maze, Empire VS Orcs, Bird Blast, Bubble Pop, Devil Hunter, Ice Breaker, Jewels Miner and many other top popular games.==========================

reviews.title: By Jai
reviews.comment: IT WAS OK BUT NOT SUPERB, THE BALL KEPT GETTING STUCK, SO I TRIED TO SKIP AND IT COSTED COUNTS WHICH I HAD TO PURCHASE. UNINSTALLED
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea, but needs a few fixes
reviews.comment: I love the game, but it is very hard to play due to the size of the explosions when it hits, making it very hard to see the ball until it it\'s almost past the paddle, the screen following the ball and shifting just before the bottom, and worst of all, the frequent freezes (right after hits) giving me almost no time to react since the ball jumps ahead in a direction I can not anticipate while I can not move the paddle at all. If fixed, the game would be my favorite. As is, it\'s pretty frustrating to play.
reviews.author: Rebekah Kievlan

reviews.title: Tiny pieces and slow decents
reviews.comment: Fun concept just gets extremely frustrating when the ball gets stuck bouncing between the walls and basically takes the entire time to come down. The tiny shards left over are impossible to hit its really luck with little control over the ball. Id suggest making it like other ice breaker games reach a certain percent or make it so those tiny pieces arent left behind! Thanks.
reviews.author: Stephanie Boden

reviews.title: Pad bar should be little big other wise good &catchy graphics
reviews.comment: Good Catching Brilliant
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The first Ice breaker game was a lot of fun. This one is very annoying, they need to fix the bug that causes the ball to get stuck bouncing in the middle of the screen
reviews.author: Jessica Dean

reviews.title: Irritating
reviews.comment: It leaves little microscopic shards, that you have to hit in a timed type game....the ball frequently bounces side to side an inch at a time which takes forever, and/or gets stuck bouncing side to side the physics are irritating.....the shapes of the sculptures don\'t help lol. More of a trial and error, or luck...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uninstalling
reviews.comment: \"skips\" and freezes my phone every time i start playing..
reviews.author: Jackie Olver

reviews.title: Swags w/paddle move
reviews.comment: This game is very cool and a would be 5 stars but each time I move the paddle it swags or freezes causing me to lose the ball. Though I do like this and would keep it hoping for a fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lba
reviews.comment: It could be a decent game if all through it it didn\'t keep leaving the screen for something else. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Lauren Mandy

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good resolution, new idea of ice breaking. Well done!
reviews.author: Daniel Doualla Ekwe

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love this game... I can\'t stop playing it...
reviews.author: BYRD BYRD

reviews.title: Nice BUT
reviews.comment: Its a fun game like meteor and graphics are beautiful BUT the screen bounces up and down and with the advertisements at the bottom makes it a bit stressful as you try to play and avoid clicking on the random advertisings on accident .
reviews.author: Uni Corn

reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
reviews.comment: My 4 yr old daughter loves this game as do I:)
reviews.author: Joe Sullivan

reviews.title: Uninstall!
reviews.comment: The targets you have to destroy look exactly like ceramic destroyer...  that is a great game... This, would be good if the ads were not where the paddle is...   seriously game maker idiots!  What the hell were you thinking?  You ruined it! Uninstalling! WHY IS THERE A TIME LIMIT? Idiots!  WHAT THE HELL IS WITH THE COINS? WHY DO YOU NEED TO USE THE COINS FOR SOME LEVELS? This is the worst paddle breaker game out there!  Plus, the paddle someones gets stuck eyed the screen moves up and down. Stupid devs...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good to waste some time
reviews.comment: Love this game. Annoyed that the ball gets stuck going back and forth from wall to wall. Wasted my whole time waiting for the ball to inch back down. Other then that...fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: TERRIBLE PADDLE CONTROL
reviews.comment: I got this as I thought it was the same as Ceramic Destroyer or Amazing Breaker, both of which I love but this games far from enjoyable. The most annoying thing is even if u hit the ball straight it keeps going side to side taking ages to come back down near the paddle. Plus the paddle is so small u can barely see it at times. Lastly, u will find u are always left with tiny bits of ice to hit which takes up so much time that u could lose ur game and have to start all over. Just not enjoyable so un-install
reviews.author: Lucia Carpenter

reviews.comment: Very pretty game.  It would have been better if the paddle didn\'t leave the screen and there weren\'t so many ads.  The ads were distracting.  Also having so many reminders to rate the game was annoying.  But I think these issues could probably be easily addressed.  The explosions were cool and I liked the unique style of the game.
reviews.author: Sinu Etzel

reviews.title: Ice breaker
reviews.comment: Addictive! Great for keeping the mind alert n hand to eye coordination. Fab!
reviews.author: Nicola Lash-hartnoll

reviews.title: Terrible gameplay
reviews.comment: The physics engine was left out, which is 99% of the game. Good potential if they get it fixed.
reviews.author: Sterling Bates

reviews.title: LOVE IT..
reviews.comment: Love the game its so diffrent then the ones i play i love it Great Job all you Guys. Thump UP.
reviews.author: soraya olvera
